subject: MySpace email address change request - please confirm
body:
Hi ,

You have requested to change your MySpace account email address.

Current email address:

gnitpick@speedy.uwaterloo.ca

New email address:

spiegiewarwick@hotmail.com

To confirm that you want to change your account to the new address, click on the link below:

http://collect.myspace.com/index.cfm?fuseaction=user.confirmEmail&GUID=D084-6-4EA4-C-C4A3E99

or enter the following code in the "Change of Address" box in your account settings.

D084859A



-------------------------

At MySpace we care about your privacy. This email is never sent unsolicited. 

If you think you've received this email in error, or if you have any questions or concerns regarding your privacy, please contact us at:

privacy@myspace.com

MySpace, Inc.
8391 Beverly Blvd. #349
Los Angeles, CA 90048
USA
